title: Call Me Sir, Boy!
description: Please note that this version of the story is no longer available. A new version has been released as part of the Kinky Cupid series, under the title Base Over Apex.Losing a Valentine's bet just might lead Jack to the best night of his life...Jack’s Valentine’s Evening started with him losing a bet and being stuck wearing a baseball cap with a bloody stupid slogan emblazoned across it for the rest of the day. Bored with the submissives that populate the local club scene, he doesn’t expect things to get any better as the night progresses. But, when a stunning stranger kneels naked at his feet and offers Jack his submission, he soon finds himself mastering a man whose kinks match his perfectly. The cap fits. The only question now is, does the dominant who’s wearing it…?
author: Kim Dare
